title: Number Line
text: To think about this question, you might want to locate 3 and -4 on a number line.

title: Using Number Line to Reach Conclusion
text: For numbers a and b, when a is to the right of b on the number line, we say $$a>b$$ (read \"a is greater than b\").

title: Answer
text: Since 3 is to the right of -4 on the number line, we say $$3>-4$$.
